title: The Death of Traditional FP&A
summary: Why static annual budgets are failing in a dynamic economy and what rolling forecasts can do.
content:
Focusing on the Annual Budget is like steering a ship by looking at the wake behind you. In today's volatile market environment, the static budget is dead.

We need to move towards rolling forecasts and driver-based planning...

title: Why EBITDA is Lying to You
summary: Understanding the gap between accounting profits and real cash flow in SaaS businesses.
content: EBITDA is a useful metric, but it removes the very things that kill growing businesses: Working Capital and CapEx.
